other_tests.findings: Right-sided PICC which terminates in the caval atrial junction.

Stable multichamber cardiomegaly with coronary artery calcifications; stable enlargement of the main pulmonary artery suggestive of pulmonary artery hypertension; stable left greater than right lower lobe airspace disease with trace pleural effusions.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Stable masslike enlargement of the left thyroid lobe increased in size from 3.8 x 4.2 x 3.5 cm to 5.4 x 3.7 x 6.4 cm compared to prior CT.
